attributes.title: One star
attributes.review: It took days to fully download and it made my phone very glitchy I would not recommend this app to anyone.

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I downloaded this app so see why he’s so great and to hopefully change my opinion on him but once I opened the app my house was blown up.

attributes.title: App

attributes.title: Cheetos🍊🍊🍊
attributes.review: ✨🧚🏻‍♀️💕go baddie💕🧚🏻‍♀️✨but without the bad💕🌸🧚🏻‍♀️, this app is horrible honestly how can you even work the app!  This took about a week to download and the app is very confusing😡🤬!  Do not download😡😬😡🙄!!!!!!🖕🏻🖕🏻🖕🏻🖕🏻🖕🏻

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: Why does it take years to download and is really glitchy. Me thinking trump is awful tryna look for something good bout him, nothing. He’s just a bad president and so is this app, smh. Now he’s tryna ban tik tok? No..not today.

attributes.title: THIS APP IS THE WORST APP!
attributes.review: I had such a bad experience with it. I couldn’t spend more than two minutes looking at his UGLY face before I had to leave the app. I’m closer to losing hope in humanity.

attributes.title: nudes
attributes.review: when i opened the app expecting to just enter my mobile number, trumpie’s nudes came up instead. i believe he was trying to seduce people into following him with his fat orange body however i found myself projectile vomiting at the sight of the croissant penis. it was absolutely disturbing and i should be pressing charges because i was flashed against my own will
